ComicInfo.Title: Tutor Trouble; When You Wish Upon A Pumpkin; Movie Time
ComicInfo.Summary: Taking on the role of tutor, Peppermint Patty must teach Sally Brown the art of being a good student. Luckily Peppermint Patty has some tricks up her sleeve. No one knows their way around the classroom better than the one and only Peppermint Patty!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:23. [CVDB426922]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Jeff Dyer, Nat Gertler
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Robert Pope, Stephanie Gladden
ComicInfo.Inker: Andy Hirsch, Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Robert Pope
ComicInfo.Colorist: Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Marcie, Peppermint Patty, Sally Brown, Snoopy
